name: SELF-CARE or DARE!
description:
This game was made as a submission for the Trans Joy Jam by @stargazersasha!!  I strongly encourage you to check out all the other wonderful submissions contributed to this jam as there never is enough trans Joy going around in this world! 


Self-Care or Dare! is a 1-person ritual game challenging the player in the great ways of self-care, introspection and home keeping.

Using 36 prompts and a random number generator of your choice this game offers you a fun but simple way to attempt those procrastination-worthy but important daily tasks, that will support your body and mind in making further space for your personal joy.

Centering our well-being as trans people is a much needed act of love, responsibility and perseverance. That doesn’t change the fact that it’s hard to always be mindful of such things as regularly drinking water and doing the dishes. We do what we can and a little creativity in those attempts doesn’t hurt.

Content Warning: mental health, slight nsfw, mentions of food and medication
